caption.p: Receiver operating characteristic curves showing the performance of PSI (AUC 0.720, 95% CI 0.654 to 0.7897) and APACHE II (AUC 0.720, 95% CI 0.653 to 0.784) for predicting 30-day mortality in critically ill influenza patients supporting information files. APACHE, Acute Physiology and Chronic HealthEvaluation; AUC, areaunder the curve; PSI, pneumonia severity index.
